---
title: "Contact form"
format:
  html:
    theme: darkly
    toc: false
---

<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">

<style>
.contact-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 3rem;
  margin: 2rem 0;
}

.contact-form {
  background: #2d3748;
  padding: 2rem;
  border-radius: 10px;
  border: 1px solid #4a5568;
}

.contact-info {
  background: #2d3748;
  padding: 2rem;
  border-radius: 10px;
  border: 1px solid #4a5568;
  text-align: center;
}

.contact-header {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
  color: #60a5fa;
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.name-fields {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.form-group label {
  display: block;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  color: #cbd5e0;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.form-group input,
.form-group textarea {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  border: 1px solid #4a5568;
  border-radius: 5px;
  background: #1a202c;
  color: white;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.form-group textarea {
  height: 120px;
  resize: vertical;
}

.submit-btn {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  background: #60a5fa;
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background 0.3s;
}

.submit-btn:hover {
  background: #3b82f6;
}

.contact-details {
  margin-top: 2rem;
}

.contact-item {
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  background: #1a202c;
  border-radius: 10px;
  border-left: 4px solid #60a5fa;
}

.contact-item strong {
  color: #60a5fa;
  display: block;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}

.social-links {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 2rem;
  margin-top: 1.5rem;
}

.social-icon {
  width: 60px;
  height: 60px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.social-icon::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.2), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.social-icon:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.social-icon:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px) scale(1.1);
  box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(96, 165, 250, 0.3);
}

.email-icon {
  background: #ea4335;
}

.linkedin-icon {
  background: #0077b5;
}

.github-icon {
  background: #333;
}

.social-icon i {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: white;
}

.icon-label {
  margin-top: 0.5rem;
  color: #cbd5e0;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.social-item {
  text-align: center;
}

@keyframes float {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0px); }
  50% { transform: translateY(-10px); }
}

.social-icon {
  animation: float 3s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.social-icon:nth-child(1) {
  animation-delay: 0s;
}

.social-icon:nth-child(2) {
  animation-delay: 0.5s;
}

.social-icon:nth-child(3) {
  animation-delay: 1s;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .contact-container {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 2rem;
  }
  
  .name-fields {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
  
  .social-links {
    gap: 1rem;
  }
  
  .social-icon {
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
  }
}
</style>

```{=html}
<div class="contact-header">
  <h1>CONTACT ME</h1>
</div>

<div class="contact-container">
  <div class="contact-form">
      <form action="https://formspree.io/f/xzzkggzj" method="POST">
      <div class="name-fields">
        <div class="form-group">
          <label for="firstName">First Name</label>
          <input type="text" id="firstName" name="firstName" required>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
          <label for="lastName">Last Name</label>
          <input type="text" id="lastName" name="lastName" required>
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div class="form-group">
        <label for="email">Email</label>
        <input type="email" id="email" name="email" required>
      </div>
      
      <div class="form-group">
        <label for="message">Type your message here...</label>
        <textarea id="message" name="message" required></textarea>
      </div>
      
      <button type="submit" class="submit-btn">Submit</button>
    </form>
    
  <script>
    document.querySelector('form').addEventListener('submit', async function(e) {
      e.preventDefault();
      const submitBtn = this.querySelector('.submit-btn');
      const originalText = submitBtn.textContent;
      
      // Show loading state
      submitBtn.textContent = 'Sending...';
      submitBtn.disabled = true;
      
      try {
        const response = await fetch(this.action, {
          method: 'POST',
          body: new FormData(this),
          headers: {
            'Accept': 'application/json'
          }
        });
        
        if (response.ok) {
          submitBtn.textContent = 'Message Sent!';
          submitBtn.style.background = '#10b981';
          this.reset();
          setTimeout(() => {
            submitBtn.textContent = originalText;
            submitBtn.style.background = '';
            submitBtn.disabled = false;
          }, 3000);
        } else {
          throw new Error('Failed to send');
        }
      } catch (error) {
        submitBtn.textContent = 'Error - Try Again';
        submitBtn.style.background = '#ef4444';
        setTimeout(() => {
          submitBtn.textContent = originalText;
          submitBtn.style.background = '';
          submitBtn.disabled = false;
        }, 3000);
      }
    });
    </script>
  </div>
  
  <div class="contact-info">
    <div class="contact-item">
      <strong>Hiten Ladkani</strong>
      Data Analyst | Marketing Analytics Professional
    </div>
    
    <div class="social-links">
      <div class="social-item">
        <a href="mailto:hiten317@bu.edu" class="social-icon email-icon">
          <i class="fas fa-envelope"></i>
        </a>
        <div class="icon-label">Email</div>
      </div>
      
      <div class="social-item">
        <a href="https://linkedin.com/in/hiten-ladkani" target="_blank" class="social-icon linkedin-icon">
          <i class="fab fa-linkedin-in"></i>
        </a>
        <div class="icon-label">LinkedIn</div>
      </div>
      
      <div class="social-item">
        <a href="https://github.com/hiten317" target="_blank" class="social-icon github-icon">
          <i class="fab fa-github"></i>
        </a>
        <div class="icon-label">GitHub</div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<script>
// Add click animations
document.querySelectorAll('.social-icon').forEach(icon => {
  icon.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
    this.style.transform = 'scale(0.9)';
    setTimeout(() => {
      this.style.transform = '';
    }, 300);
  });
});
</script>
```
